name: FaberCloud
0:
”Alexa open Faber Cloud”
”Alexa tell Faber Cloud to turn on the hood”
”Alexa ask Faber Cloud what's the air quality”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: faber cloud
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Faber Cloud skill you can interact with your Faber kitchen hood by voice!
Download the Alexa skill on your smartphone and then you'll be able to command your latest paired device with the Faber Cloud app (available both for iOS and Android).
Simply say "Alexa run Faber Cloud" and interact with your Faber range hood.
